subject: Revised Delegation of Power for Refinancing/ Restructuring in PPP Projects (HAM)-Reg.
text: HRay 7cly <THRf qifera5rut (aes 9aev Jr rTHrf 4A1q4, TRa TGTR) National Highways Authority of India (Ministry of Road Transport and Highways, Government of India) 77747 *oA 4-5 & 6, 8/7-10 , ERa, #f Rarit 110 075 0 G-5 & 6, Sector-10, Dwarka, New Delhi-110075 TN/Phone 91-11-25074100 / 25074200 NHAI Policy Guidelines/ Financial Matters/ 2025 Policy Circular No.8.4.50/2025 dated 21st June, 2025 {Decision taken on E-Office File No. FINDIV-21/2025-O/0 DGM (Finance-I) (Comp. No. 280633)} Sub: Revised Delegation of Power for Refinancing/ Restructuring in PPP Projects (HAM) -reg: NHAI vide Policy Guidelines No. 8.4.25 /2021 dated 02nd March, 2021 issued Guidelines for processing refinancing proposal for PPP Projects: The same were circulated by said Circular . 2. Now the Authority in its 162nd Meeting approved the proposal to revise the Delegation of Power for Refinancing/ Restructuring in HAM Projects. 3. The requisite modification in Sr No 5 of Table mentioned at Para-3 of Policy Guidelines No. 8.4.25/2021 dated O2nd March, 2021 is enclosed at Annexure-1. 4. This issue with the approval of Competent Authority. Encl:: As stated above. oklx (CS. Sanjay Kumar Patel) Vc Chief General Manager (Coord:) To: AIl Officers of NHAI HQ ROs PIUs/ CMUs/ Site Offices to: 1 _ Hindi Division for translation in Hindi: 2 Library for hosting the circular on library site. 3. Web Admin for circulation. NHAL Copy
